summary: The BuildRequest is to enable resident discharge and archive (deletion) actions from the Dashboard, with a constraint not to duplicate existing Dashboard actions already implemented in frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx. The diff only modifies backend/main.mo and project_state.json; there are no frontend Dashboard changes shown, so the requested Dashboard enablement is not evidenced in this diff. The diff also includes backend/type/state changes and project metadata updates that are not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Enable resident discharge and archive (soft delete) actions from the Dashboard.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes are shown to any frontend Dashboard code (e.g., frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx). The only modified files are backend/main.mo and project_state.json, which do not evidence enabling Dashboard actions.
evidence: MODIFIED FILES list shows only: backend/main.mo, project_state.json

hallucinated_features.description: Backend/main.mo modifications (type/state logic changes) unrelated to enabling Dashboard discharge/archive actions.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is about enabling actions from the Dashboard (frontend behavior). The diff shows changes only in backend/main.mo with type definitions and modules, without any explicit linkage to Dashboard UI actions in the provided summary.
Updating project_state.json is not part of the BuildRequest and does not contribute to enabling discharge/archive actions from the Dashboard.
